author: Mike Hixenbaugh, Perla Trevizo, ProPublica/The Texas Tribune, Lexi Churchill, ProPublica/The Texas Tribune
title: U.S. plans new safety rules for portable generators after carbon monoxide deaths
description: The Consumer Product Safety Commission plans to recommend new mandatory rules to make portable generators safer, saying manufacturers have not voluntarily done enough to prevent carbon monoxide poisoning deaths caused by their products.
